text: Beat Happening is an American indie pop band from Olympia, Washington. Calvin Johnson, Heather Lewis, and Bret Lunsford started the band in 1982 after meeting at The Evergreen State College. The band has released five studio albums. == Albums == * Beat Happening (1985) * Jamboree (1988) * Black Candy (1989) * Dreamy (1991) * You Turn Me On (1992) Category:1982 establishments in the United States Category:1980s American music groups Category:1990s American music groups Category:2000s American music groups Category:2010s American music groups Category:American pop music groups Category:Indie bands Category:Musical groups established in 1982 Category:Olympia, Washington Category:1980s establishments in Washington (state)
title: Beat Happening
